title: Infra Migration using Graph ommunity Detection in Application Network
description: Migrating modern enterprise applications requires understanding complex interdependencies to minimize downtime and performance issues. Traditional manual planning is error-prone and unscalable. By analyzing application networks to detect tightly coupled components, migrations can be planned efficiently and with reduced risk..

title: Structured Data to Explanation
description: Automatically generate readable SAR explanations by converting structured transaction data into concise, compliant natural language summaries using ML and template-based NLG.

title: Rule Threshold Analysis and Identification using Bayesian Optimization
description: Tooling and automation for small teams—CLI, integration, and examples.

title: Sales Attribution using Multiple method
description: This project implements and compares five sales attribution approaches—rule-based (first-touch, last-touch, linear), Markov-chain, causal/incrementality estimation, and a Bayesian Marketing Mix Model—on a synthetic dataset to evaluate channel impact and conversion dynamics.

title: Agent-Based Semantic Extraction with CrewAI
description: Automatically extract meaningful entities, relationships, and context from unstructured or semi-structured text using intelligent agents.
